directions: In a food processor, process garlic to a rough mince, add dill and olive oil and pulse a few times to combine.
Lay fish fillets in a baking dish, skin side down. Rub garlic mixture over fish. Refrigerate for 2 hours.
Preheat an oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
Bake in preheated oven for 15 minutes. Do not overcook.
ingredients: 1 teaspoon salt and pepper to taste
title: Garlic and Dill Salmon
